result.eng: It was the night between the two Days of Christmas.
result.ga: eadar an dá lá nollag a bhí ann
result.orig: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí ann
result.html: eadar an dá lá nollag a bhí annIt was the night between the two Days of Christmas.
result.ponchtml: eadar an dá lá nollag a ḃí annIt was the night between the two Days of Christmas.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
